name: Orc Charmer
description:
Sad orcs are attacking! Charm them and make them happy!

Each orc has a special combination of elements that charm them.

Select the correct elements using the buttons at the bottom, then press the cast button to cast the spell!

Reach wave 10 to win.

Credits

Game Design and Programming: Carlos Villagran (cavigt)

Art: Alhvi Balcarcel (alhvi)

Music: 

"Galway" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
